title: Automated Restaurant
p: The courier picks up the order in 15 minutes and delivers it immediately to the recipient.
download: Download our app via QR code
camera: Point the camera at the QR code to go to the app
p2: Integrated quick menu with the ability to add new dishes and drinks offline and automatically change for other users.
p3: Integrated fast posters are designed to create correct and effective directions for customers to place orders online and complete payments.
p4: Communication systems are integrated with other systems of the enterprise. This simplifies data exchange, consolidates all technological tools.
p5: It simplifies storing all information in one place. This makes it easier to access information or add data.
p6: All service providers quickly and easily access information, automatic responses quickly identify and eliminate errors with customers.
p7: All service providers quickly and easily access information, automatic responses quickly identify and eliminate errors with customers.
title4: Easy Management of Kitchen Processes via Platform
p8: Managing processes and quickly receiving orders creates speed and cleanliness in order handling. It simplifies waiting for and accepting orders.
p9: Posters in the management system, SMS services, telephony, and delivery ensure simple, efficient, and fully managed operations.
title6: Working with System Couriers Made Even Easier!
p10: Automatic system acceptance of orders entered on time, automatic selection among couriers, and monitoring of each order are possible.
